name: Reminiscence
descHash:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"In the brief beautiful dream, it was as if the old soul returned to the colorful waters of childhood."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

694487.name: Refined Aether
694487.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>6000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694487.lore:
A canister of aether that has been extracted and distilled using special procedures.

"The Garden looks forward to recreating a past glory, but it is a 'past glory' selected by them. Do you understand?"

694488.name: Condensed Aether
694488.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>2000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694488.lore:
A can of Aether refined through special techniques.

"Handle with care, do not drop or place pressure upon it. If damages and leaks occur, please refer to chapter II of the Leak Disaster Response Manual for emergency response."

694489.name: Sparse Aether
694489.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>500</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694489.lore:
An imaginary substance that shouldn't exist in reality. The basic material to create Light Cones.
The images contained in the Light Cones become clearer when infused with this substance.

"I see, so this is the supposed 'memoria' of the Garden of Recollection. No wonder the Memokeepers can set off on galactic voyages with memories."

6471577.name: Seedling of Manas
6471577.desc: Memory's cells extract thoughts, propagating in the heart of the inscriber. Used to level up Traces moderately for Remembrance characters.
6471577.lore:
The seeds take root and sprout. Branches and buds weave together, transmitting signals like a living network of synapses. Over the passage of years, some wither and fade, while others flourish, growing strong enough to bear life and form the vessel of a soul.

"We did not abandon the flesh. We merely transformed it into something... more enduring."

6720910.name: Flower of Ālaya
6720910.desc: This is another form for life to exist and a substance that the universe cannot forget. Used to level up Traces significantly for Remembrance characters.
6720910.lore:
It matures. It becomes a web that constrains history, a blossom from the past. Life is its flower bed or its pistil. If you become the pistil, then you remember the universe and the universe remembers you. You are memory.

"Memory is the true form of all things, thus there is no creation or annihilation in the Anāśrava pure land."

6744567.name: Bīja of Consciousness
6744567.desc: Consciousness fuses with matter, giving rise to the embryo of memory. Used to level up Traces slightly for Remembrance characters.
6744567.lore:
This thing does not truly exist until you see, hear, or sense something. This existence born from sensations soon falls silent, buried in the soil of thought — it may sprout one day, or it may not.

"Such is the substance that forms our bodies, existing because you remember."

20170864.name: Courage-Torn Chest
20170864.desc: A fragment of the Strife Titankins after their demise. Normal material used for enhancement.
20170864.lore:
The slothful generals began to drill, and the reclusive sages began to plot. Then humanity discovered they could shatter the creations of gods, and slaughter became war.

"Fear is the chisel of courage."
comeFrom: Titankin at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher

20389475.name: Glory-Aspersed Torso
20389475.desc: The heart of a Strife Titankin, full of divine power. Advanced material used for enhancement.
20389475.lore:
In the beginning, humanity fought wars to stay alive, but now some fight as fearlessly as the Titankins of Strife to achieve death. The Kremnoans say that perhaps warriors of flesh and stone share the same heart —

"And this heart is called glory, with courage flowing within."
comeFrom: Titankin at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

20445700.name: Fear-Stomped Flesh
20445700.desc: Dust that forms the Strife Titankins. Crude material used for enhancement.
20445700.lore:
The tide of death sweeps across the world, and giants of hatred and resentment step forth from the River of Souls. All fear and cower before that stone-carved legion.

"Slaughter is the stone from which fear is hewn."

skill.name: Going to Sleep
skill.descHash: When memosprite's turn starts, the wearer and the memosprite each gain 1 stack of "Commemoration." Each stack increases DMG dealt by #1[i]%, stacking up to #2[i] time(s). "Commemoration" is removed from the wearer and the memosprite when the memosprite disappears.
